title: Combine all IMU's and joints in the AtlasState message

content.raw:
The atlasState message doesn't contain

- hand joint angles, velocities
- laser spindle joint angle, velocity
- head/hand IMUs

This requires us to match the packets together to do full body state estimation and overly complicates the communication layer. It would be very useful if all these values where grouped in one message.

Same goes for the AtlasCommand message for the hands.

- Jesper
content.html:
The atlasState message doesn't contain

  • hand joint angles, velocities
  • laser spindle joint angle, velocity
  • head/hand IMUs

This requires us to match the packets together to do full body state estimation and overly complicates the communication layer. It would be very useful if all these values where grouped in one message.

Same goes for the AtlasCommand message for the hands.

  • Jesper
